Reviews.Title: Great Camera at a Great price.
Reviews.Author: Saha "reena"
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use. Has multiple aim and shoot options. The Video capture is good.I am happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: refurbished?
Reviews.Author: Brittney N. Scurry
Reviews.Content: The Camera didn't work. When I tried to take a picture it looked and sounded like it was taking several. But then when I tried to look at the picture none were savedSo I sent in my waranty. Haven't heard anything back yet.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: Cristina Cappy
Reviews.Content: I actually won this camera so I can't complain about too much but I was a little disappointed that the internal memory of the camera is so little!  I was only able to take 12 pictures before realizing that I needed a memory card to take more.  Not sure why it didn't come with one.  I also own a Canon camera very much like this one and it takes hundreds of pictures without an additional memory card.  I also wasn't very impressed with the quality of the photos.
